item.title: Report X-2023081284
item.description:
Report X-2023081284

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-17
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at hazmat during sunrise sort in a plastic bin. DescribePack: Inspection showed package of "NU-BRITE CONDENSER COIL CLEANER" was wet and torn with internal leakage, from a loose cap. Damage most likely caused from being dropped or mishandled. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be returned to shipper in a salvage drum, unless otherwise stated.

item.title: Report X-2023081276
item.description:
Report X-2023081276

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-16
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the sunrise sort, the package arrived at the hazmat cage in a container leaking. Upon inspection, the plastic pail containing "Decon Labs Ethanol 200 Proof" was found to have a puncture at the bottom of the pail. It was placed upside down and into a salvage drum to be sent back to the shipper unless otherwise. DescribePack: The pail failure was due to a small puncture at the bottom of the plastic pail. It was due to a equipment mishap in the loading process. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: The plastic pail was placed upside down and the puncture site covered into a salvage drum.

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived during day sort in plastic bin. DescribePack: Inspection showed package of "RAPICIDE PA" was wet and torn, from 2 inner containers with loose caps. Damage most likely caused from being dropped or mishandled. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be returned to shipper in a plastic salvage drum, unless otherwise stated.

item.title: Report E-2023090267
item.description:
Report E-2023090267

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-14
  • City: HAMILTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: When unloading freight from truck driver discover two jerricans that were slightly leaking from the bottom. Further investigation revealed that both jerricans had been slightly punctured on bottom from screws from the pallet they were both staged on. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as were the damaged jerricans and returned to service center awaiting final disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023081156
item.description:
Report X-2023081156

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-13
  • City: TRENTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Shipping box crushed while in transit causing three of four 99% Isopropyl Alcohol 1Gal jugs to have loos caps. Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing. DescribePack: Shipping box crushed while in transit causing three of four 99% Isopropyl Alcohol 1Gal jugs to have loos caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Upon discovery the package was placed into a salvage drum to contain the spillage. DescribePack: Upon my inspection of the plastic jerrican containing GARDOCLEAN S 5413 5 gallons, there was a small puncture hole that triggered a slow leakage of contents. Of about 2 ounces of leakage. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: FACILITY PROCEDURES FOR DAMAGED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL FOLLOWED, CONTENTS CONTAINED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2023081083
item.description:
Report X-2023081083

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-14T03:11:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-31
  • City: WAYNE
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: When Joe Cook (Ops manager) went through his door checks, he discovered a leaking package that turned out to be a hazmat. The spillage was limited to the outer packages. The QA put on proper PPE and contained hazmat in a red hazardous bin. DescribePack: The package did not have visible cracks or punctures in the inner containers. The caps of both of the containers were a bit loose upon evaluation DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Hazmat was stored within a red hazardous materials bin and kept upright upon inspection.
